p: Weight loss was determined as mentioned above and results were expressed as percentage of total weight loss. Minimally processed lettuce’s color was evaluated using a colorimeter (Chroma meter CR400 Konica Minolta, Japan) and L*, a*, b* values were recorded. Chroma value (C), hue (h), and whiteness index (WI) were calculated as C = ( a* 2 + b* 2) 1/2, h = tan −1( b*/ a*), and WI = 100 − [(100 − L*) 2 + a* 2 + b* 2] 1/2 [ 34, 35]. Color index (CI) was calculated as CI = ( a* × 1000)/( L* × b*) [ 36]. Browning index (BI) was calculated as BI = 100 × (X − 0.31)/0.17, where X = ( a* + 1.75 × L*)/(5.645 × L* + a* − 3.012 × b*) [ 37].
